newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's MEFF to adapt MIBOR contract to euro.
newsitem.headline: Spain's MEFF to adapt MIBOR contract to euro.

text.p: Spain's financial futures market MEFF Renta Fija said on Wednesday it will change the settlement basis for two of its short-term contracts, MIBOR 90 plus and MIBOR 360 Plus.

A statement added that the changes will affect contracts maturing after January 1999. Since Spain would be part of European economic and monetary union either in January 1999 or later it will be possible to settle the two contracts in euros instead of in pesetas, MEFF said.
Similarly, the interest rate basis for the FRA at three months and one year would be calculated in euros and not in pesetas anymore.
